name: places/ChIJa4zd6KJZwokRWTnBx4oygbY
formattedAddress: second floor, 13 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: second floor, 13 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011-5502, USA

originalText.text: I visited Shareen over the course of a long day seeing wedding dress makers across the city, and it was immediately clear to me that she was the right fit for me and would partner with me to create my perfect wedding dress. She was a total stand-out from everyone else I visited. Shareen and Eddie have a deep knowledge base about vintage styles, a keen eye for what will look best on every kind of body, and such wisdom about the whole wedding process. I trusted her completely and she didn't disappoint, I was just delighted with the dress she created for me. If you feel like a cookie-cutter wedding isn't for you, have an appreciation of vintage style, and want a dress made for your personality, your body, and your vision of your day, there is no substitute in New York City for Shareen.

originalText.text: I have only so far had an initial consultation with Shareen with my Mom, MIL and sister and WOW we had a great time and Shareen is clearly INCREDIBLE at what she does. She very quickly put me in my favorite and most flattering silhouettes. I am still figuring out exactly what I'm looking for but can't speak more highly about the experience and her expertise. And I am obviously being conscious about my budget but for a New York City custom made dress from the designer herself it seems very reasonable! She also does custom vails.

originalText.text: I love Shareen. I felt super comfortable and I couldn’t be happier with the dress she made me. I never wanted to take it off. Recommend it SO MUCH over the more corporate places — I went to BHLDN after I first met Shareen and marched right back to her. I never felt rushed, I went back as many times as I wanted, and she made me feel like family. Cannot recommend highly enough

originalText.text:
The best. There is no better way to have the wedding dress of your dreams than to work with a designer from the ground up. Shareen and her dressmaker Eddie designed and created the wedding dress of my dreams. Shareen has an unparalleled ability to translate thoughts and ideas into design, and Eddie’s sewing wizardry translates design into physical form. I absolutely could not have found a more perfect dress by looking at pre-made dresses from a store.

By working w Shareen, I also learned SO MUCH about the fit and tailoring of clothing, and what does or doesn’t make something super flattering on your body. These are invaluable lessons that I have carried into the rest of my closet. Working with Shareen was a masterclass in clothing design…. In addition to the best, most personalized, small-business way to have a wedding dress made!

originalText.text: Shareen is an incredible designer and overall human. She creates elegant custom dresses that cannot be found in any other bridal shop.  She was the 4th stop for us in our dress search, and I knew that the dress she would make would be unlike any other.  At first I didn't know what to expect, but she tries different styles and listens to your vision and then uses her pieces and knowledge of women's bodies to put together the perfect dress.  We had many fittings to make it perfect, and each time I saw her she was patient and a true perfectionist.  I loved the gown so much and am so lucky to have met her.  Please make sure to go here in your bridal dress search.
